Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Joe Biden "has officially lowered the age of consent to 5 years old."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or legitimate news reports to back up the assertion.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no effort or bill in Congress or by the Biden administration to lower the age of consent to age 5.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that there is a bill or official action to lower the age of consent without any basis or evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the posts and screenshots circulating on social media are false and digitally manipulated.
